description.en:
Jingga was getting tired of spending days together with Grey. He felt that their relationship had lost its aura of magic. At the same time, Grey didn't seem to care about the situation.

Then Jingga planned to end their story before it got worse. But suddenly came a little girl named Nila.

Will Nila's presence be able to reacquaint Grey & Jingga's heartstrings?

(Source: re:ON Comics via Google Play Books, MTL)
description.id:
Jingga mulai jenuh menjalani hari-hari bersama dengan Grey. Ia merasa pertalian hati mereka telah kehilangan aura keajaiban. Pada saat yang sama, Grey seakan tak peduli dengan keadaan itu.

Lalu Jingga pun merencanakan untuk mengakhiri kisah mereka sebelum menjadi lebih buruk. Namun tiba-tiba datanglah gadis mungil bernama Nila.

Akankah kehadiran Nila mampu mengakrabkan kembali tali hati Grey & Jingga?

(Sumber: re:ON Comics via Google Play Books)
